sentence.Network_en: Solar energy, if well harnessed, will be a widow's cruse.
sentence.Network_cn: 太阳能如能妥善利用, 将成为取之不竭的能源.

sentence.Network_en: Trust! cruse will yet supply thee, never empty, never filled.
sentence.Network_cn: 相信! 瓶子不至乾涸, 永远不空, 也不满.

sentence.Network_en: And he said, Bring me a new cruse, and put salt therein.
sentence.Network_cn: 以利沙说, 你们拿一个新瓶来, 装盐给我.他们就拿来给他.
